org.deidentifier.arx.kettle.meta

Class RegionStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deidentifier.arx.kettle.meta.RegionStore

  • public class RegionStore
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the Storageformat for one Region.
    Every region has one of this file. This file also handles the Creating of the Storages for the whole Project with Regions.
    Since:
    1.5
    Author:
    Florian Wiedner

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegionStore

        public RegionStore(java.lang.String name,
           double sampling,
           long population)
        Creates a complete new RegionStore out of the Data Provided. This is for the Case, when you do not have any Stored Values until now.
        Parameters:
        name - The Name of the Region
        sampling - The Sampling Size out of the Population
        population - The PopulationSize of this Region
        Since:
        1.1
